summary: The University of Washington (UW) is a top public research university in Seattle, founded in 1861. It has a large main campus and satellite campuses in Tacoma and Bothell. UW is known for its research, especially in medicine, engineering, and science, and is one of the largest research spenders in the nation. The university has many facilities, including libraries, museums, and sports stadiums. It is the flagship school of Washington state and a member of the prestigious Association of American Universities. UW's sports teams, the Huskies, compete in the NCAA Division I.
title: University of Washington
